title: I found elo hell
body:
Nope its not bronze
No its not silver
Sike you thought it was gold

You guessed it. 

PLAT 5

Ive never faced such a tough place to get out of in all of my games of ranked(OVER 2000 IN 3 SEASONS) 

You get the one trick ponies, you get the players that just dont care anymore, your  games  are decided  at champ select

If you want to get to plat this season, youll regret it.

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
replies.body:
It's because the system sees you're not fit to be higher than that. Stop complaining. There are tons of plat 5 players who are easily climbing because they deserve to be at a higher elo. 

Continue whining and crying rather than improve your game.
